sentences.en: A certified copy oft he Business Registration Certificate of the Applicant.
sentences.cn: 申请人商业登记证的核证副本.

sentences.en: A slip of the tongue oft bring about unexpected result.
sentences.cn: 口误经常产生意外的结果.

sentences.en: And oft I catch them smiling as they pass.
sentences.cn: 我时常感觉他们经过时会微笑.

sentences.en: Deutsch essen oft dem Essen einen Nachitsch zum Beispiel Eis oder Pudding.
sentences.cn: 德国人在饭后经常吃饭后甜食,例如冰淇淋或布丁.

sentences.en: Er kommet so oft zu mir, wie er will.
sentences.cn: 他经常想什么时候来我处就什么时候来.

sentences.en: For the miners, only time will tell which, if any, will succumb to this oft-misunderstood disorder.
sentences.cn: 对于矿工们来说，只有时间会告诉我们，他们是否会得上这种常常被误解的疾病。

sentences.en: It turns out to be a far more irritating poem than its oft-quoted lines suggest.
sentences.cn: 结果发现这首诗比起它常被引用的那几句来更加恼人。

sentences.en: Jetzt lebe ich in Deutschland , aber oft fahre ich doch nach China.
sentences.cn: 现在我生活在德国, 但是还是经常回中国.

sentences.en: Morrisons was trying to delay the OFT investigation.
sentences.cn: 莫里森斯竭力推迟OFT的调查.

sentences.en: Othello . O, yes ; and went between us very oft.
sentences.cn: 奥瑟罗 啊, 不, 他常常在我们两人之间传递消息.

sentences.en: Some of the oft-neglected test cases are boundary conditions: what will your code do when faced with unusual input?
sentences.cn: 常常被忽视的一种测试用例是边界条件：当遇到不正常的输入时，代码会做什么？

sentences.en: The Foreign Secretary's views on the treaty are well-documented and oft-repeated.
sentences.cn: 外交大臣就该条约发表的观点有大量记述并被屡屡提及。

sentences.en: The oft - cited correlation with monetary conditions is tenuous, too.
sentences.cn: 人们常常提到的上证综指与货币环境之间的关系也不足为信.

sentences.en: The oft - drawn contrast extroversion and introversion is entirely superficial.
sentences.cn: 在外向和内向之间通常所作的对比完全是表面的.

sentences.en: Then came to him the disciples of John, saying, Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft, but thy disciples fast not?
sentences.cn: 那时，约翰的门徒来见耶稣说，我们和法利赛人常常禁食，你的门徒倒不禁食，这是为什么呢。

sentences.en: This accounts for another oft - and widely - used single - character name of Shanghai, Hu.
sentences.cn: 上海,简称“沪”, 由此而来.

sentences.en: This state I oft bemoan; but what's to do?
sentences.cn: 我常常哀叹这种情形; 可又能怎么办?

sentences.en: Wir sassen auch oft und sprachen, vernuenftig wie alte Leut.
sentences.cn: “从此我们就是一家人了”有些老猫会说.
